message.body: Hey. I just got a call from Zoe's mom. She needs someone to stay over on Dec. 4th. They're leaving in the morning and will be back on the eve of the 5th. I'll still be in FL then. Are you available? It'll be a cash deal. Michelle can probably help out with the afternoon walks if you need to work. Let me know today if possible.
Yes I can do it if she has the leash on her like last time.
Hmm, right... Michelle could probably help with that. I'll give her a call.
I'm working a lot this week but should be less next week
Yeah, I'm working a shit ton too. Leaving for FL next Wed and need to make some cash before I go. Just finished some new stitchings, though. Made a nice pill cutter on gold vinyl.
Fabric wholesale store in s Philly
Ah, heard about it . Is it on Columbus?
I usually get my stuff on 4th. Jack B's.
It's by johns roast pork just south of Marshall's.
I'll have to check it out. Maybe I can get D or someone with wheels to take me over there.
It's not a long walk from yours. Look it up.
I can bike over, but it's tough for me to carry a lot of fabric on my bike. Especially the big rolls.
